author: Justine Calma
title: Plastic bags are making a comeback because of COVID-19
description: There has been no evidence yet of reusable grocery bags spreading the novel coronavirus, but they should be handled more carefully to reduce the risk of transmitting COVID-19.
content:
Theres no evidence of reusable bags spreading the novel coronavirus, but people are being cautious 
Photo by Fiona Goodall / Getty Images
